content: 33 39 instep rounds 7-8 k sts/33 38 heel flap sts round 9 *k3 p5 k3 repeat from * to end rounds 10-11 k heel will be worked over 33 38 sts place round 12 p remaining 33 39 sts on a holder for instep repeat rounds 1-12 for pattern heel flap is worked back and forth set-up for small heel part 2 row 1 wrong side k row 2 slip 1 k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k1 ssk ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo ssk ssk k2tog k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k2 ssk k1 31 sts note heel flap stitches have been decreased by 2 sts row 3 slip 1 p across to end of row set-up for medium heel part 2 row 1 wrong side k row 2 slip 1 k3 yo ssk ssk k2tog k2tog yo k1 yo k1 yo k1 ssk ssk k2tog k2tog k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo ssk ssk k2tog k2tog yo k4 34 sts note heel flap stitches have been decreased by 4 sts row 3 slip 1 p across to end of row cuff loosely cast on 66 77 stitches join being eye of partridge heel careful not to the twist your stitches place row 1 right side slip 1 *k1 slip 1 repeat marker to indicate beginning of round from * to last 2 3 stitches ending with k2 3 round 1 p row 2 slip 1 p across to end of row round 2 k sox on the beach copyright 2010 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only you may photocopy instructions and charts for personal use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com row 3 slip 1 k1 *k1 slip 1 repeat from * stitches on instep and stockinette on sole to last 3 2 stitches ending with k3 2 row 4 slip 1 p across to end of row repeat these two rounds until 64 72 stitches remain 33 37 instep sts/31 35 sole sts repeat row 1-4 until heel flap measures 2 1/4 to 2 1/2 inches or desired length ending on foot continue working as established lace row 1 or 3 pattern on instep and stockinette on the sole until foot measures 2 1/2 to 3 inches less than turn heel desired foot length end on round 2 of lace row 1 slip 1 p17 21 p2tog p1 turn pattern row 2 slip 1 k6 9 ssk k1 turn row 3 slip 1 p7 10 p2tog p1 turn row 4 slip 1 k8 11 ssk k1 turn continue working one more stitch until all the stitches have been worked you should end on a knit row with 19 22 stitches remaining do not turn work begin gusset gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped stitch along side of heel pm to indicate start of instep purl 33 39 stitches to next marker pick up and knit same one less number of stitches along remaining side of
